backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, tasks, task history, audit logs, overtime entries, and comparison utilities for sorting entries.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels for deployment evidence tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short functional summaries for all key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based theme variables for light and dark modes including color tokens and layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the React app and including a build timestamp trigger.
frontend/public/rebuild-trigger.txt: Build metadata file used to force rebuilds with timestamp and version marker.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, theme normalization, profile setup, and dashboard routing with an error boundary wrapper.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Error boundary component that catches rendering errors and shows a reload prompt.
frontend/src/components/AssistantDetailV: Manager-only assistant detail panel showing overtime data, CSV export, task habit metrics, and completion history.
frontend/src/components/AssistantList.ts: Renders a scrollable list of assistants with overtime totals, handling loading and empty states. Includes selectable assistant cards with overtime summaries fetched per assistant.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with logo, username, theme toggle, and logout button. Uses theme switching and a dropdown menu for theme options.
frontend/src/components/ManagerAnalytics: Aggregates overtime totals for assistants and displays summary rows, progress bars, and a team bar chart. Fetches overtime data per assistant and handles loading states.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeChart.ts: Generates a cumulative overtime trend chart (line or bar) from overtime entries with date formatting. Handles loading and empty states using card layouts.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeForm.tsx: Form for adding or using overtime with validation for date and minutes, then submits parsed data to the backend. Provides toast notifications and resets form on success.
Displays paginated, searchable overtime entry history with formatted dates and time breakdowns. Supports loading skeletons and shows entry type indicators.
Displays overtime totals with days, hours, and minutes, showing skeleton loaders while data is loading. Uses cards and icons to present accumulated overtime details.
frontend/src/components/todo/AuditLogVie: Renders a searchable and filterable audit log of task actions with badges, timestamps, and error handling. Pulls audit log and task data, then filters, sorts, and displays entries in a table.
frontend/src/components/todo/EvidenceIma: Shows a modal dialog displaying a full-size preview of an evidence image for a task. Allows closing via a header button.
frontend/src/components/todo/MarkTaskDon: Dialog for marking a task as completed, supporting optional comments and image upload with validation and preview. Submits base64-encoded image data and comment to a callback.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskLedgerD: Displays a task’s full action history in a modal with timestamps, users, actions, and optional evidence previews. Fetches history data and shows loading, empty, or table states accordingly.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskPrefere: Manages assistants’ task preferences, allowing selection of an assistant and updating preference states per task. Fetches assistants, tasks, and preferences, displaying them in a table with icons and mutation support.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoSection: Main to‑do section component handling task creation, updates, deletion, completion, filtering, and sorting via React state and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTable.t: Renders a task table with urgency indicators, actions, and history/image dialogs, formatting task timestamps and frequencies.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTaskDia: Dialog for creating or editing a task with validation, frequency selection, and optional delete confirmation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/clear actions, and initializes/stores identities using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for profiles, overtime, assistants, tasks, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and overtime-related colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the App.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantDashboard.ts: Assistant dashboard showing to-do tasks, overtime logging, summaries, charts, and history with tab navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen allowing users to authenticate via Internet Identity with a styled card UI.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Manager dashboard providing team management, analytics, audit logs, and to-do tools with tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Profile setup form for registering username and language with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeStyles.ts: Utility returning CSS class names for overtime cell styling based on add/use type.
frontend/src/utils/taskHabits.ts: Helpers for computing on-time metrics, formatting task completion history, timestamps, and preference labels/colors.
frontend/src/utils/todoDates.ts: Provides utilities for labeling task frequencies, computing next due dates based on daily/weekly/monthly rules, formatting due date text, and calculating urgency scores.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing parameters from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, current version state, architectural notes, and existing feature requirements for deployment behavior and theme defaults.
